cancels requests whose cancel time has been exceeded :type simulation_state: SimulationState :param simulation_state: state to modify :rtype: SimulationUpdateResult :return: state without cancelled requests, along with this update function

hive.state.update.simulation_update module¶

class hive.state.update.simulation_update.SimulationUpdate[source]¶

Bases: abc.ABC

abstract update(simulation_state)[source]¶

takes a simulation state and modifies it, returning the updated simulation state :type simulation_state: SimulationState :param simulation_state: the state to modify :rtype: SimulationUpdateResult :return: the updated sim state, along with any reporting

hive.state.update.update_requests module¶

hive.state.update.update_requests.update_requests_from_iterator(it, initial_sim_state)[source]¶

add requests from file when the simulation reaches the request’s time :type it: Iterator[Dict[str, str]] :param it: expected to be a Request iterator which streams in row data taken from a DictReader :type initial_sim_state: SimulationState :param initial_sim_state: the current sim state :rtype: SimulationUpdateResult :return: sim state plus new requests
